entities.name: arthur weasley
entities.description: Arthur Weasley is mentioned as the father of one of Dumbledore's daughters. He is being targeted by Lucius Malfoy to discredit him and get rid of a highly incriminating object.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is mentioned as trying to discredit Arthur Weasley and get rid of an object. He is also in Azkaban due to Voldemort's fury over the Horcrux.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is sitting in thought and asking questions about Voldemort's Horcruxes.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as confirming that destroying all of Voldemort's Horcruxes would make him mortal.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as having his Horcruxes destroyed and being in a state where he can be killed by uncommon skill and power.
